es una red social descentralizada en We: is a decentralized social network in Web3, with virtual spaces inspired by real cities, where users, thanks to immersive technologies, a tokenized ecosystem and rewards for consuming content on the platform, will create a Metaverse that generates a positive impact in the real world.
